title: 怎么看待香港地产商Ivan Ko去年１２月就联系外国政府谋求建城接受出走的香港人？
contents:
https://www.theguardian.com/world/2020/jul/28/hong-kong-property-tycoon-ivan-ko-pitches-new-city-idea-to-ireland

A department of foreign affairs spokesperson in Ireland confirmed there had been talks with Ko but appeared to pour cold water on the idea. “Following an initial approach in December 2019, the department had limited contact with the individuals involved to provide helpful and realistic guidance about Ireland.


早在去年１２月，Ivan Ko就开始联系外国政府讨论建城收人的事了。在今年７月份通过国安法之前，他怎么知道香港人一定会大规模移民外国？他也许早就有内部的消息了？
